metadata.synopsis: Combat reaction for the Dark Justiciar ghosts in the Silent Library. When the player disturbs them they will silence the player . On the third disturbance they become hostile
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggers on the dark justiciar ghosts' turn in combat (triggers once)
